963890.name: Pace Chasers
963890.description:
Gear up for the ultimate speedrun experience with Pace Chasers, the latest creation from Studio Backpack! Tired of the barriers holding you back from speedrunning glory? Pace Chasers aims to make speedrunning accessible to all, combining classic platformer aesthetics with modern time optimization gameplay.



Speedrunning Made Inclusive! Pace Chasers welcomes all players, regardless of skill level, to revel in the thrill of speedruns. No need for technical wizardry to record your runs – simply jump, dash, flip, and trick your way to victory. Elevate your style with diverse skins and visual effects that let you stand out.

A Tale of Cooperation and Speed, dive into a cooperative realm where champions from varied dimensions and eras join forces. What starts as a race soon transforms into an epic quest to rescue the cosmos. Immerse yourself in a whimsical Saturday morning cartoon-style story, crafting an adventure that delights and captivates all ages.

Diverse Modes and Fierce Competition: Engage in high-octane action with Arcade mode, using your own ghost data to tailor the challenge to your liking. Amp up the adrenaline in Arena mode, engaging in an asynchronous multiplayer showdown against leaderboard rivals' ghosts. Each track offers three distinct ways to vie for supremacy: Any%, 100%, and trick score leaderboards, providing a never-ending supply of challenges

Chase the Ghosts, Beat the Clock: In Pace Chasers, you'll chase the ghost of the fastest player or your own personal best, mastering obstacle courses with finesse. Beat the pace by finding the fastest path while managing your dash economy, and set the pace for others to follow. Are you up for the challenge?



Become the Ultimate Pace Chaser in this Fast-Paced Speedrun Adventure! Master diverse obstacle courses, beat your personal best, and compete against friends' ghost data. With retro aesthetics and an engaging pick-up-and-play experience, Pace Chasers brings speedrunning to a whole new level!"

Get ready to embrace dynamic movement mechanics that challenge you to balance energy conservation with explosive bursts, maximizing the potential of the speed-boosting dimensional dash power system.

Level Editor and Content Updates: Unleash your creativity with the level editor, sharing your creations with the community and expanding the game's content. Pace Chasers continues to grow with regular content updates, including new levels, skins, and animations, to keep the excitement alive.
